div.head: 湯火傷灼瘡
div.div: sores following harm from scorching by boiling water and fire

bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

entry.def: sores following harm from scorching by boiling water and fire

sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with huo chuang 火瘡 , fire sores. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry jing zhong tai ji ping 井中苔及萍 quotes Zheng lei ben cao 證類本草 : 陶隱居云：廢井中多生苔、萍，及磚土間 生雜草、萊藍，既解毒，在井中者彌佳…亦療湯火灼瘡 , “Tao Yinju says: Moss and duckweed, as they often grow in discarded wells, and all sorts of herbs and lai lan growing between bricks and stones, dissolve poison. Those from wellsare the best…They also cure sores following harm from scorching by boiling water and fire ”.
